programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires - EP 27
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 22
programme.desc: Haute-Garonne, the longest department in France, offers a wide variety of landscapes and cultures. Toulouse, the capital of the Occitanie region, is its economic and demographic hub. The river is also a vital part of the department's identity and Tiga starts his weekend on the water.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Rendez-Vous Au Parc - EP 4
programme.desc: From high-quality watch and clock making to dairy production, woodworking or bell making, the Jura Vaudois Regional Park is steeped in craftsmanship. It also offers a natural environment rich in wooded pastures and dry stone walls; and the timeless tradition provided by the clock-making farms of the Joux Valley.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 13
programme.desc: Julien meets Fabien, Raphaelle and little Rose, a family who originally came from France to set up home with their sled dogs eight years ago. Today they live off-grid in the Yukon.

programme.title: Un Soir Au Music-Hall (Folies Bergere)
programme.desc: Bob, a GI on leave in Paris, falls in love with Claudie, dancer at the famous cabaret the Folies Bergere. He marries her, settles in Paris and begins a singing career. But as one concert tour follows another, it doesn't take long for jealousy to rear its ugly head...

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 2
programme.desc: Trails winding their way through the heart of the Alps, impressive mountains seemingly impossible to pass yet where goods and people have always crossed between Switzerland and Italy: Savoy is brimming with little-known treasures. Enthusiastic hikers and heritage-lovers are today working to make them better-known.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Caraibes Sauvages, Les Rivages De La Biodiversite
programme.desc: The Antilles stretch between the two Americas, forming an arc of islands endowed with a rich and generous nature. Life, carried by wind, wave or bird took hold with tenacity. Today the beautiful but fragile Caribbean islands constitute one of the world's richest areas of biodiversity.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: La Crete, Berceau De La Mediterranee
programme.desc: Cradle of one of the oldest civilisations and veritable crossroads of the Mediterranean, Crete has been subjected to innumerable influences throughout its history, from Venetian to Ottoman and, more recently, European. The Greek island built itself a strong identity, present in its architectural, culinary and musical heritage.

programme.title: Tuamotu Sauvages - EP 3
programme.desc: Coral confetti fighting against being swamped by the sea, the atoll is a unique island world of fascinating beauty: a delicate frontier between water, land and sky. In the Tuamotu Archipelago, the land is literally born of the sea, the soul nourishing a complex community of thousands of living creatures.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur ! - EP 66
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel

programme.title: Abers Road - EP 3
programme.desc: So far away from LA', 'Et mon pere', and 'Je pars' are just some of the songs that have made Nicolas Peyrac's name. The singer introduces Gaetan Roussel to the places that marked his childhood in St-Brice-en-Cogles, near Fougeres (Ille-et-Vilaine). The tour encompasses Tiercent, Cancale and La Pointe du Groin.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 4
programme.desc: The memory of the living world, where nature is magnified and acclaimed, is masterfully portrayed in Miki Nakamura's paper artwork. Installations rich in beauty and finesse, yet never intended to make you forget that she was born in Hiroshima, Japan.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 13
programme.desc: Julien meets Fabien, Raphaelle and little Rose, a family who originally came from France to set up home with their sled dogs eight years ago. Today they live off-grid in the Yukon.

programme.title: Resistances - EP 4
programme.desc: Summer 1943; despite setbacks and lack of means, armed resistance develops to unprecedented levels. The end of 1943, de Gaulle heads the republican institutions that join forces with the resistance movement inside France. Following the allied landings, Henri Rol-Tanguy triggers an insurrection in Paris, opening the way for General Leclerc.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 30
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 20
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot prepares a soba noodle salad with breaded avocado.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 13

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 90
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 52
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 28
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo - EP 12
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness - EP 2
programme.desc: Tobias and his parents are forced to run away. On arriving in the Basses Branches, a region of the Tree reputed to be wild and hostile, they discover a magnificent natural environment. Tobias meets a young girl his own age, Elisha.

programme.desc: Eschborn-Frankfurt is an annual semi classic cycling race in Germany, starting in Eschborn and finishing in Frankfurt. programme.title: PL 100 - ROBIN VAN PERSIE
programme.desc: Premier League 100, celebrates some of the leading names to have achieved iconic milestones within England's top flight. From scoring over 100 goals, to making over 100 clean sheets, we speak to the legends that left their mark and reflect on the goals and saves that set them apart from their rivals

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 12/13
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2012/2013 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 14
programme.desc: Nemanja Vidic grew up in war-torn Serbia and went on to become one of the greatest defenders in English football. PL Stories sits down with him to explore his journey from Belgrade to Manchester. We also hear from former coaches and players about how his childhood shaped him into the person he is today and his lasting impact on the Premier League.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2012/2013 (MNU)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 44
programme.desc: Considered a true Manchester City icon, Pablo Zabaleta was one of the most respected full backs of his generation. He played an integral part in the clubs extraordinary Premier League title in 2012. From Argentina and Spain, we chart how he reached those heights.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: Despite only featuring in one full Premier League season, in 2012/13, Miguel Perez Cuesta - AKA, Michu, remains one of the most iconic signings in Swansea City's history. Now a Sporting Director back in his homeland of Spain, Michu looks back on his time in the Premier League which saw him achieve cult status in South Wales, as well as reflect on what could have been but for injuries that saw his playing career cruelly cut short.

programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Morgan Rogers, Joelinton, Martin Odegaard and Ryan Gravenberch.

programme.desc: Highlights of all the fixtures from Matchweek 13 of the Premier League League. Including Chelsea at home to Aston Villa, Manchester United against Everton, and Tottenham, who host Fulham at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 32
programme.desc: As Thomas Tuchel begins his journey as England's new manager, PL Stories dives into his journey to the top, tracing his rise from playing career to football management. After facing financial struggles and working in a bar, Tuchel's determination led him to become one of the Premier League's most respected managers. We showcase his unique path, blending hard work, passion, and tactical innovation to reach the pinnacle of football.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 17
programme.desc: The man who orchestrated Chelsea's greatest ever night in a famous double winning spell as caretaker manager, Roberto Di Matteo sits down with PL Stories to reflect on winning the Champions League and FA Cup in 2012, whilst he also reminisces on the 90s and his time in the heart of the Blues midfield.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 2
programme.desc: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard joins former England teammate Owen Hargreaves to examine exactly what it takes to become an elite central midfielder.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Aston Villa (MW10) - EP 98
programme.desc: Aston Villa have won three of their last four Premier League away games against Tottenham (L1), including the last two in a row under Unai Emery. They last won three consecutive away league games against Spurs between 1922 and 1924.

programme.title: Brentford vs Ipswich Town (MW09) - EP 83
programme.desc: Brentford have lost just one of their last nine league games against Ipswich (W4 D4), with the first meeting between the sides since a 2-0 home win for the Bees in April 2019.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs AFC Bournemouth (MW13) - EP 125
programme.desc: Wolves have won their last two Premier League games, as many as they had in their previous 22 combined (D5 L15). They last won three in a row in December 2023

programme.title: Brentford vs Newcastle United (MW15) - EP 143
programme.desc: Brentford are winless in all six of their Premier League meetings with Newcastle (D1 L5), the most they've faced an opponent without ever winning in the competition.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Arsenal (MW13) - EP 126
programme.desc: West Ham have lost more Premier League games overall (36) and at home (15) against Arsenal than they have vs any other opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Southampton vs Chelsea (MW14) - EP 136
programme.desc: Southampton have won their last two Premier League games against Chelsea, as many as in their previous 18 (D5 L11). They last won three consecutive league games against the Blues between 1979 and 1985.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Liverpool (MW14) - EP 135
programme.desc: Newcastle have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool, and are winless in 15 against the Reds since a 2-0 win in December 2015 (D4 L11).

programme.title: Southampton vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW16) - EP 159
programme.desc: Southampton have won just one of their last 28 Premier League games (D6 L21), with their 1-0 win over Everton in November their only clean sheet in their last 27 in the competition.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Arsenal (MW17) - EP 165
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost just two of their last 19 away league games against Crystal Palace (W10 D7), with both defeats coming in the Premier League by a 3-0 scoreline (April 2017, April 2022).

programme.title: West Ham United vs Liverpool (MW19) - EP 186
programme.desc: West Ham have won just one of their last 16 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L12), beating them 3-2 at the London Stadium in November 2021.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Liverpool (MW17) - EP 170
programme.desc: Tottenham won this exact fixture 2-1 last season thanks to a 90th minute Joel Matip own goal. Indeed, this fixture has seen more 90th minute winning goals than any other in Premier League history (6)

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Chelsea (MW15) - EP 149
programme.desc: Tottenham have won just one of their last 11 Premier League games against Chelsea (D2 L8), picking up a 2-0 home win in February 2023.

programme.desc: Aston Villa have won three of their last four Premier League away games against Tottenham (L1), including the last two in a row under Unai Emery. They last won three consecutive away league games against Spurs between 1922 and 1924.

programme.title: TF2 - The Fighter
programme.desc: In this episode the reality of living and training in close quarters sets in and causes tension in The Fighter pad. The final qualifying fight to make the TF2 quarterfinals takes place and goes down to the wire.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 3: Tokyo, Japan - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kyokushin Karate and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Breaking featuring Masters Shihan Yuzo Goda and Shihan Isamu Fukuda.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "The Dream Match" of Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya that raked in $70 million in Pay-per-view revenue and launched Pacquiao into global stardom. Also on the card, action from a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 1 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Takakeisho, Onosho, Kotoshoho and Daieisho.

programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: WCCB Frank Martin vs. Artem Harutyunyan
programme.desc: Undefeated future star Frank "The Ghost" Martin takes on undefeated Olympic Bronze Medalist Artem Harutyunyan in a WBC Lightweight World Title eliminator. In the co-feature Elvis Rodriguez meets former world champion Viktor Postol on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we look at different weapons used throughout the martial arts and the technology used to make them stronger and more efficient.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Paris as some of the 2016 Olympics' finest athletes battle for their shot at glory.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Dozens of contestants converge in the Big D to compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles the Tilting Table and Ring Toss!

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA
programme.desc: The 16th Annual Fighters Only World MMA Awards are back this month on FIGHT SPORTSR, hosted again by one of the most entertaining personalities in MMA, Chael Sonnen and taking place at the Theater at the Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Paris as some of the 2016 Olympics' finest athletes battle for their shot at glory.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Terunofuji, Tobizaru, Ryuden and Tamawashi.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Dozens of contestants converge in the Big D to compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles the Tilting Table and Ring Toss!

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA
programme.desc: The 16th Annual Fighters Only World MMA Awards are back this month on FIGHT SPORTSR, hosted again by one of the most entertaining personalities in MMA, Chael Sonnen and taking place at the Theater at the Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

programme.title: WCCB Frank Martin vs. Artem Harutyunyan
programme.desc: Undefeated future star Frank "The Ghost" Martin takes on undefeated Olympic Bronze Medalist Artem Harutyunyan in a WBC Lightweight World Title eliminator. In the co-feature Elvis Rodriguez meets former world champion Viktor Postol on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jean Pascal vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Light Heavyweight Unification battle as WBO Champion Jean Pascal (25-1, 16 KOs) takes on undefeated IBO Champion, Chad Dawson, (29-0, 17 KOs) on August 14, 2010 at the Bell Centre in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The fight ends in a decision after a controverial headbutt.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Floyd Mayweather vs. Felipe Garcia
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. One of the all-time greats is featured just one year from making his pro debut, as a 10-0 "Pretty Boy"Floyd Mayweather - long before he became "Money" - has a tough test against Felipe Garcia of Mexico.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBC welterweight title bout between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Victor Ortiz, which generated $78 million in pay-per-view revenue from 1.25 million buys. Also on the card, action from super welterweight champ James Kirkland and Alfredo Angulo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan feature Hokutofuji, Todushoryu, Hoshoryu and Endo.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.desc: Diana learns that she inherited a house from her aunt. Estate attorney Matt insists on sorting out the details over Christmas. During her stay, Diana finds clues that suggest her aunt was murdered.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9) - EP 33
programme.desc: As the remaining couples come together for their final dinner party, long-running feuds and bottled-up emotions boil over, exposing cracks in more than one relationship.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something - EP 3
programme.desc: The two adventurers follow the mountaineer deep into the remote areas of Jiri Mountain. They experience a feast with makgeolli (Korean rice wine) and local mountain folk.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something - EP 4
programme.desc: They meet the finest biker of Jiri Mountain, a poet who fled city life to live in the mountains. From this poet, who captures photos of stars and flowers, the two actors learn poetry.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something - EP 5
programme.desc: Nam-gil and Sang-yoon arrive at the end of Korea, at the beautiful Mihwangsa Temple in Haenam, with a stunning view of the South Sea. They spend a day at the temple, with the head monk.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9) - EP 36
programme.desc: Six weeks on from the end of the experiment, the participants reunite to catch up on life in the outside world - but as old feuds are revisited, an explosive new secret comes to light.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9) - EP 37
programme.desc: It's the final night of the reunion, but as the couples come together on the couch to reflect on their relationships, one pair reveal something that shocks the whole group.

programme.title: Trapped In The Farmhouse
programme.desc: A woman on the run from her abusive boyfriend seeks shelter from a terrifying storm in an isolated farmhouse, unaware that something far worse is waiting for her inside.

programme.title: Taken In Montana
programme.desc: When her parents go missing on their family vacation, teen Regan must put the clues together to find them - but she may be trusting the wrong people to help, putting herself in danger.

programme.title: Infidelity Can Be Fatal
programme.desc: A private investigator who specialises in exposing lecherous, cheating husbands thinks she's met the love of her life in a chance encounter but as it turns out, this dream man may be her worst nightmare.

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: It's Seyun's birthday during their trip to Singapore. To celebrate, they decide to stay in a nice hotel for one night. But what consequences will Seyun's statement bring?

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9) - EP 37
programme.desc: It's the final night of the reunion, but as the couples come together on the couch to reflect on their relationships, one pair reveal something that shocks the whole group.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5) - EP 59
programme.desc: Our team in Tampa is back at it; taking on their newest zombie flip, a 1920s bungalow in the trendy Seminole Heights neighborhood. The renovations needed for this home are extensive.

programme.title: A Dangerous Affair
programme.desc: Pilates instructor Amelie begins a steamy affair with one of her clients, handsome journalist Pierce Dalton, only to find herself embroiled in a deadly love triangle.

programme.title: It's Beginning To Look A Lot Like Murder
programme.desc: Diana learns that she inherited a house from her aunt. Estate attorney Matt insists on sorting out the details over Christmas. During her stay, Diana finds clues that suggest her aunt was murdered.

programme.title: Trapped In The Farmhouse
programme.desc: A woman on the run from her abusive boyfriend seeks shelter from a terrifying storm in an isolated farmhouse, unaware that something far worse is waiting for her inside.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something - EP 6
programme.desc: Veterinarian-turned-priest Michael, who came to Jeju Island and fell in love with it, now tends to a vast ranch. Nam-gil and Sang-yoon assist Father Michael in caring for the horses.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S16) - EP 16
programme.desc: The cooks are divided into four teams where they must compete in the famous MasterChef Team Relay, in a bid to create one tasty, cohesive plate of food - with only 30 seconds to handover between each leg!

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Rachael shows us how to whip up a French country-inspired, tangy, creamy chicken dinner with vinegar and tarragon, served with a simple salad and a baguette with soft butter.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics - EP 1
programme.desc: Classic dishes are twisted right off the plate and into your hand! These handheld bites are fun to eat, with no knives or forks required because they're served on a stick!

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics - EP 19
programme.desc: There isn't much in life that can't be improved with cheese, and these chefs take that to heart by taking classic cheesy dishes and twisting them beyond your imagination.

programme.title: Deliciously Twisted Classics - EP 20
programme.desc: You'll stop in your tracks when you see these deliciously deceiving dishes. Chefs create a calzone with a clever catch, a hotter version of hot chicken and a cool spin on an ice cream sandwich.

programme.title: Best In Chow - EP 5
programme.desc: Little Italy in San Diego used to be an Italian food hub. Now it's one of the go-to spots for everything from brunch food to late night gourmet. Matt stokes three rounds of competition on his quest.

programme.title: Best In Chow - EP 8
programme.desc: While Buffalo is known for inventing the sauce that's now a household name: Buffalo sauce, the neighbourhood of Allentown has an otherwise eclectic food scene. All these dishes are within walking distance!

programme.title: Jason's Table: Masterful Dishes - EP 1
programme.desc: Follow Jason Wang and learn about the White Snow Osmanthus Crab, a classic Taiwanese dish that marries theatricality with oceanic umami. Master Chef Kuo Hong-che demonstrates how it is made.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5) - EP 60
programme.desc: The team finds a proper zombie in a stellar up-and-coming location. The backyard boasts a well-constructed shed that has a lot of potential, the house is covered floor to ceiling with dog excrement.

programme.title: Vanished In Yosemite
programme.desc: Katrina and Jennifer meet the perfect guy: Rick. Smitten, Katrina is certain she has met "Mr. Right"; however, when Katrina goes missing Jennifer suspects kidnapping and sets out to rescue her sister.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Italian Dream Home (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Rachael is setting out to achieve her dream of owning a villa in Tuscany, having purchased an enormous stable with no plumbing or electricity. It's all hands on deck as construction gets underway.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But China's dominance of the supply chain for rare-earth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputing-where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Scientists and entrepreneurs are testing radical ideas like solar radiation management and ocean fertilisation - and finding funding for it.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 5

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Nikolaj meets people in Kenya, Switzerland and the US who are working to remove the three big hurdles between us and a true transportation revolution.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Nikolaj Coster-Waldau visits Germany where a port is working on the ultimate sustainable solution, and travels to Kenya and Greenland to learn how art and living in harmony can help humans.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

Six years have passed since Moriguchi Keijiro, a retired constable at the magistrate's office, became the caretaker of a merchant's dormitory in Negishi. Keijiro feels the passage of time since losing his daughter, Michiyo, in a tragic incident before her wedding. Despite this, he continues to resolve consultations, spending his days close to people's hearts.

programme.desc: One stormy night, a man named Kosaku (Abe Hiroshi) pays a visit to Tamiko (Tokiwa Takako), a dairy farmer in Nakashibetsu, surrounded by the magnificent nature of eastern Hokkaido. Kosaku is suspicious of the people around Tamiko, but he deftly helps out on Tamiko's farm, which is in need of help. Tamiko's young son Takeshi (Sato Yutaro), who has been living a lonely life since his father's death, takes to Kosaku, Tamiko comes to trust him deeply.

programme.desc: Culinary personality Koh Kentetsu travels around Japan, in search of fine foods worth preserving for the next 100 years. This time, the spotlight is on Osaka - buzzing with excitement for the upcoming Expo! Along the way, he discovers the meat of the future unveiled at the Expo, and explores Osaka's evolving food culture - from uniquely local kimchi and aged kombu to an artisan farmer's premium chrysanthemum greens.

programme.desc: An easy-to-do exercise program for everyone from children to the elderly.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "Godzilla and the 35 Pirates" (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: City-Scope (R)
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Drama 10 "The Great Passage: I'll Make a Dictionary" Eps. 1 (New) (R)
programme.desc: Kishibe Midori (Ikeda Elaiza), an editor for a popular fashion magazine, finds herself transferring to the lexicography division following the magazine's discontinuation. The place is filled with a group of quirky characters, led by Majime Mitsuya (Noda Yojiro), a boss with a shaggy hair who is extremely serious. While being tossed about by them, Midori is influenced by their patience and passion for making a dictionary which takes over a decade, and she gradually immerses herself in the work.

programme.title: Songs for Everyone
programme.desc: A song program where children can sing along by reading the lyrics on the screen.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: Memorial Service for the WWII Victims in Okinawa
Drama Serial "Anpan" Week 61 (R)
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: News Around Japan
programme.desc: Program introduces the latest news from all over Japan.

programme.title: World Weather

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: My Gardening
programme.desc: Learn useful tips on gardening.

programme.title: Kyoto's Hidamariya Garden Shop
programme.desc: Offering tips on growing flowers and greens through an animated short story.

programme.title: Points at Issue
programme.desc: Specialists from different fields will make commentaries on current event issues.

programme.title: The Fountain of Ancient Wisdom "Ashikaga Yoshimasa" (R)
programme.desc: The challenges we face today are similar to what our forerunners went through. The program searches for clues to solve problems, utilizing the wisdoms of historical figures.

programme.title: Exploring Factories (R)
programme.desc: An entertainment program visiting small and large factories to discover the latest science, hidden artisanship, and enthusiastic people that support traditions of Japanese manufacture.

programme.title: PythagoraSwitch
programme.desc: There are various interesting laws and rules and philosophies hidden in our daily lives. This program introduces children to them and how to think.

programme.title: Fun with Japanese
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a word as a theme, exploring its meaning and history while discovering the charm of Japanese language. The program also features dance performances of quotes from the world's great figures, visits schools to interact with children, and introduces classical performing arts and songs, making it enjoyable for both children and adults.

programme.title: Peek-a-boo
programme.desc: Bringing out potential and capability of children aged 0 to 2 years by stimulating their feelings with pictures and sound.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Let's learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: Nyan-chu! Space! Broadcasting! (R)
programme.desc: Nyan-chu, a cat from the earth, introduces human lives and cultures to the aliens in outer space.

programme.title: Tsurube's Salute to Families
programme.desc: Veteran rakugo storyteller Shofukutei Tsurube travels across Japan with a personality, introducing families they meet along the way.

programme.title: The Fountain of Ancient Wisdom
programme.desc: The challenges we face today are similar to what our forerunners went through. The program searches for clues to solve problems, utilizing the wisdoms of historical figures.

programme.title: Night Drama Serial "Aozora Beer" Eps. 5
programme.desc: Yukio Morikawa (Kubozuka Airu), a free-spirited outdoorsy college senior, lives by the motto: "Life's richness is measured by how many ice-cold beers you drink under the open sky." He ropes in his friend Takuma (Fujioka Maito), who's struggling with job hunting, and Ichirota (Minamide Ryoka), his junior at his part-time job, for a wild adventure: paddling a condom-maker's rubber boat from a river to the sea. After completing the journey, the trio becomes hooked on camping.

programme.title: The Winning Meals of Great Historical Figures
programme.desc: What kind of meals did the great generals and people who made their marks on history eat? Comedy trio Neptune recreates the dishes with experts, exploring the lifestyle and philosophies of great historical figures of the past and present. In addition, the comedy skits by Neptune are a must-see!

programme.desc: NHK news commentators give their views on current issues.

programme.title: Yokai
programme.desc: We pursue the shape-shifting trickster Mujina in this episode - this being associated with raccoon dogs is known on Niigata Prefecture's Sado island as human, animal, yokai and deity.

programme.desc: Below your eyes is the Sea of Okhotsk in the season of drift ice - climbers are scaling a huge icefall reaching 40 metres high.

programme.title: Ethical Every Day
programme.desc: Japanese firms are rethinking mass production and disposal - the world's third-largest clothing company is recycling and reusing used clothes while one firm is reducing e-waste and helping refugees.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Tokyo Skytree, one of Japan's most famous tourist attractions, is equipped with a variety of countermeasures against disasters - we go behind the scenes to explore the tower's advanced technologies.

programme.title: The Logic of Coastal Architecture
programme.desc: Niigata / Nishizawa Ryue (Architect): Boat builders in one coastal district used their skills to make houses - Nishizawa considers how architecture is affected by a community's terrain and values.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: 75 Years On: The Battle of Kaizoku
programme.desc: Untold stories of the Battle of Kaizoku.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Small Journeys
programme.desc: Discover Sekikawa Village where the pristine Arakawa river nurtures life - locals cherish its gifts while legends tell of giant snakes bringing floods. Explore its rich nature and traditions.

programme.title: On the Wings
programme.desc: Explore one of Tokyo's remote islands! Awaiting us is a breathtaking flight experience found nowhere else in Japan.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony
programme.desc: Summer: Discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden in Uda - the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule as a sanctuary of local culture and history.

programme.title: Biz Stream

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries - watch out for some delightful illustrations too!

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan
programme.desc: We meet people in Kumamoto who cherish their ancestry and nature including a traditional inlay artisan, a group passing on the history of the building of an embankment, and a brown cattle breeder.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This time: WONK - a four-piece band with a soulful sound that goes beyond genres - and Sato Masaki, a Morning Musume.'21 alum who is a great singer and dancer.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: An animated series about a Japanese dog who gets lost in New York City. Charo says 'I want to see my owner again!', and so he starts his adventure to find his way back home.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Sweet potatoes are often baked or turned into sweets in Japan, but they can also be used to generate electricity or protect from heat - we introduce the diverse ways in which they are used and sold.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: We meet cats whose owner grows plants used to make cloth in a traditional way, and another cat - Lock - lives at a temple, takes part in sutra reading, and is practically the chief priest's assistant!

programme.title: My Eco-Friendly Farm
programme.desc: A woman from France is now an organic farmer in Okuma Town in Fukushima Prefecture - the town was affected by the 2011 nuclear accident and she is working to change that image.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Mizushiri Yoriko won the Silver Bear in the Short Film competition at the 2025 Berlin International Film Festival - she talks about her passion for creating animations that evoke a sense of touch.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Ashley Souther from the US, who teaches a class on peace at a high school in Hiroshima, as well as Sten van Daalen from the Netherlands, an apprentice potter in Saga Prefecture.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 B.C. - we examine various aspects of Jomon society with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Sannai Maruyama Site.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 1
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 32
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1977
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 649
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Our Graduation Ceremony - EP 17
programme.desc: Professor Ma Hengri (Ma Junwei), a former director turned educator, and his assistant Kelly Kwan (Tang Baoru) guide students through challenges like family issues, academic pressure, bullying, and self-worth.

programme.title: Our Graduation Ceremony - EP 18
programme.desc: Professor Ma Hengri (Ma Junwei), a former director turned educator, and his assistant Kelly Kwan (Tang Baoru) guide students through challenges like family issues, academic pressure, bullying, and self-worth.

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 40
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao (He Yu), a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er (Yang Yutong), a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embark on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: An Ancient Love Song - EP 1
programme.desc: Through multiple time travels, modern-day bestselling historical author Shen Bu Yan (Guo Jia Nan) discovers Lu Yuan's (Zhang Ya Qin) deep patriotism and learns why she was misunderstood as the 'Demon Empress'. Determined, he sets out to clear her name.

programme.title: Best Choice Ever - EP 28
programme.desc: Mai Cheng Huan, a post-95 girl from an ordinary Shanghainese family proposes to her boyfriend, Xin Jia Liang, due to her mother's urging. The well-to-do Xin family topples the balance of this relationship. Watch how Cheng Huan embarks on her own growth path.

programme.title: Best Choice Ever - EP 29

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1978

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 15
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 16
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Young Charioteers - EP 4
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 30
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 18
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 14
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 20
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 21
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: Young Charioteers - EP 6
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 31
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).
