Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 23
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 1
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 20
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 11
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 17
programme.desc: With the support of the head of the Police Authority, Guangzhouâ€™s top villain HO KEI-KIN (Wong Tze Wah) has been riding roughshod over everyone around him. He is so manipulative that he has explored every possible means in his fight for a house with the buck-toothed owner LING YUK-TSUI (Cecilia Yip). TSUI is happy to have met the upright and honorable WONG FEI-HUNG (Lam Kar Wah). The pair quickly falls in love and even feels ready for marriage.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 25
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his motherâ€™s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNGâ€™s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sunâ€™s four children fatherless. Sunâ€™s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sunâ€™s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sang's father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of "Infernal Affairs" are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Protege de la Rose Noire
programme.desc: A legendary heroine Black Rose recruits two young girls, Gill and Sandy, as her successors. Both girls have proven to be courageous and righteous, and she trains them so that they can form the ultimate crime fighting force and become the new Black Roses!

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: Another super comedy directed by Clifton Ko about more farcical couplings, mistaken identities, infidelities, and arranged marriages set in the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fiance. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend's grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobra's blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his father's old rival.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao's real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn's beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong's concubine as he knows Dong's adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon "Thundering Sword" to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts world...

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense...

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Loh's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother's death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father's death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: A young guy Wu, heads off to the Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend Lian Chu, who was promised to be his bride. When he arrives, he finds out that the family of his bride may not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family...

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.
